Package userProfile

Interface ProfileHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProfileManager
public interface ProfileHandler
Interface defining the operations for managing user profiles. Supports adding, editing, deleting, selecting, saving, and loading profiles, as well as retrieving the list of profiles associated with a specific user. Classes implementing this interface can manage user profiles with these capabilities.
Author:
Trudy Ann Roberts

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    addProfile(UserProfile profile)
    Adds a new profile to the user's profile list, provided the maximum limit of profiles has not been reached.
    boolean
    deleteProfile(String profileName)
    Deletes a specific profile by its name from the user's profile list.
    boolean
    editProfile(String oldProfileName, String newProfileName, String newProfileType)
    Edits an existing profile by updating its name and profile type.
    List<UserProfile>
    getProfiles()
    Retrieves the list of profiles associated with the user managed by this handler.
    void
    loadProfiles()
    Loads the list of profiles from the file into memory.
    void
    saveProfiles()
    Saves the current list of profiles to a file, persisting the user profile data via serialization.
    String
    selectProfile()
    Displays a selection dialog for choosing one of the available profiles.

  • Method Details

    • addProfile

      boolean addProfile(UserProfile profile)
      Adds a new profile to the user's profile list, provided the maximum limit of profiles has not been reached.
      Parameters:
      profile - The UserProfile instance to be added
      Returns:
      true if the profile was successfully added; false if the maximum number of profiles is already reached

    • saveProfiles

      void saveProfiles()
      Saves the current list of profiles to a file, persisting the user profile data via serialization.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during file writing

    • loadProfiles

      void loadProfiles()
      Loads the list of profiles from the file into memory. If the file is not found, initializes an empty profile list.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during file reading

    • deleteProfile

      boolean deleteProfile(String profileName)
      Deletes a specific profile by its name from the user's profile list.
      Parameters:
      profileName - The name of the profile to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the profile was successfully deleted; false if no profile with the specified name was found.

    • editProfile

      boolean editProfile(String oldProfileName, String newProfileName, String newProfileType)
      Edits an existing profile by updating its name and profile type.
      Parameters:
      oldProfileName - The current name of the profile to edit.
      newProfileName - The new name to assign to the profile.
      newProfileType - The new type to assign to the profile, which should be either "ADULT" or "CHILD".
      Returns:
      true if the profile was successfully edited; false if the profile was not found or if the new profile type was invalid.

    • selectProfile

      String selectProfile()
      Displays a selection dialog for choosing one of the available profiles.
      Returns:
      The name of the selected profile, or null if no profiles are available or the user cancels the selection

    • getProfiles

      List<UserProfile> getProfiles()
      Retrieves the list of profiles associated with the user managed by this handler.
      Returns:
      An immutable or mutable list of UserProfile objects representing the user's profiles. Returns an empty list if no profiles exist.
